    "Î»Free = 1.00\n",
    "kFree = 2*np.pi/Î»Free\n",
    "nref  = 2.000\n",
    "Î¸k, Ïk = np.pi/2, np.pi/4*0\n",
    "Eamp = 2.0\n",
    "Lobs = 10.\n",
    "numSamples = 500\n",
    "print('Î»xy = %.2f' % (Î»Free/nref / np.sin(Î¸k)))\n",
    "xCoords = np.linspace(-Lobs/2, Lobs/2, numSamples)\n",
    "yCoords = np.linspace(-Lobs/2, Lobs/2, numSamples)\n",
    "Î· = 0.\n",
    "EÏ = 0\n",
    "Efield, Hfield = ws.plane_wave(kFree, nref, Î¸k, Ïk, Î·, Eamp, EÏ, xCoords, yCoords, fields='EH')\n",
    "\n",
    "extent = [-Lobs/2, Lobs/2, -Lobs/2, Lobs/2]\n",
    "plt.figure()\n",
    "plt.imshow(np.real(Efield[1]), extent=extent, origin='lower', cmap=cm.watermelon)\n",
    "plt.xlabel('x/Î¼m')\n",
    "plt.ylabel('y/Î¼m')\n",
